alert.note: Alert for Stearns (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 04 at 3:53PM CST until March 05 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM CST SATURDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON SATURDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, freezing rain expected. Ice accumulations up to a tenth of an inch possible. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Stearns County. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, from midnight tonight to 9 AM CST Saturday. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from noon Saturday to midnight CST Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
